# Social Card Image Needed

You need to create a social card image for Open Graph/Twitter:

## Requirements:
- **Size:** 1200x630px
- **Format:** PNG or JPG
- **File name:** social-card.png
- **Location:** apps/docs/static/img/social-card.png

## Content Suggestions:
- unblessed logo (centered or top)
- Tagline: "Modern, platform-agnostic terminal UI library"
- Key features: "TypeScript • Node.js • Browser • blessed-compatible"
- Terminal-themed background
- Brand colors: #0dbc79 (green), #1177bb (blue)
- Dark background (#1e1e1e or #2d2d30)

## Tools You Can Use:
- Figma (free)
- Canva (free)
- Photoshop/Illustrator
- Online generators: https://www.opengraph.xyz/

## Or Use SVG-to-PNG Converter:
```bash
# Using ImageMagick or similar
convert -background none -size 1200x630 logo.svg social-card.png
```

Once created, place at:
apps/docs/static/img/social-card.png
